title: Mini Projects (All Concepts Combined)
concept: Final level of Java track. Each program uses multiple concepts together: classes, objects, constructors, arrays, strings, loops, methods, and exception handling. Solving these makes the learner industry-ready.

challenges.title: Student Grade System
challenges.description: Class Student has name and 3 marks. Method percentage() returns int percentage. grade() returns grade based on percentage: O>=90, A+>=80, A>=70, B>=60, C>=50 else F. Print name and grade.

challenges.title: Online Wallet
challenges.description: Wallet has owner and balance. deposit(x) adds, pay(y) subtracts. but if pay amount > balance throw exception and print 'Insufficient'. Otherwise print final balance.

challenges.title: Employee Management System
challenges.description: Class Employee with name, salary. HR extends Employee with bonus. Accountant extends Employee with deduction. Method netSalary() applied accordingly.

challenges.title: Basic Dictionary
challenges.description: Maintain word meanings using HashMap. Insert N entries. Then read query word and print meaning. If missing print Not Found.

challenges.title: Attendance Report
challenges.description: Class Student stores name & presentDays. totalDays given. attendance() returns percentage. If <75 print Detained else Allowed.

challenges.title: Library Management — Total Pages
challenges.description: Class Book with title & pages. Library stores list of books. add() adds book. total() returns total pages.

challenges.title: Movie Ticket Booking
challenges.description: Class Movie with price & seats. book(x) decreases seats if enough, else throws exception. Print remaining seats or Sold Out.

challenges.title: Online Shopping Bill
challenges.description: Each item has name, quantity and price per item. Bill = sum(qty * price). Print total bill.

challenges.title: Bank — Transaction History
challenges.description: Class Account has balance & ArrayList of transactions. deposit(x) adds and records. withdraw(y) subtracts if possible else ignores. Print balance then list of transactions (each in new line).

challenges.title: University Result System
challenges.description: Student has roll, name and marks of 5 subjects. total() returns sum. result() returns Pass if every subject >= 40 else Fail. Print roll, name and Pass/Fail.
